fixes.name: Number of Complaints
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated Tableau COUNTD([Complaint ID]) to DAX DISTINCTCOUNT('complaints'[Complaint ID]). This is an aggregation, so it is implemented as a measure.

fixes.name: Product % Complaints
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR Numerator = 'complaints'[Number of Complaints]
RETURN
DIVIDE(
    Numerator,
    CALCULATE(Numerator, ALL('complaints'))
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Tableau expression divides the measure by TOTAL(...) (a table calculation). Implemented as DIVIDE([Number of Complaints], CALCULATE([Number of Complaints], ALL('complaints'))) to compute percent of total. Used CALCULATE with ALL('complaints') to replicate TOTAL across the full partition and DIVIDE to guard against division by zero. Created as a measure because it relies on aggregation/table calculation.
